data.title: The Wizard of Gore
data.meta_description: Behold, the great Montag the Magnificent! His fiendish magic tricks will make you shiver with fear and recoil in disgust. But are his gruesome on-stage antics - which entail the graphic slicing-and-dicing of nubile young woman with various implements - really just simple sleight-of-hand, or is something far more sinister afoot? Local TV talk show hostess Sherry Carson aims to find out, at her peril...
